name: Future Sight (TheBeardPhantom)
description:
An experiment in RNG, giving the player full insight into the dice rolls before they use them.

Originally there were plans to add additional abilities that would allow you and the enemy to manipulate the dice rolls and steal dice. Ran out of time, unfortunately.

Additional attributions I forgot:
  • Sprites by https://game-icons.net
  • Models by https://quaternius.com/index.html
  • Models by https://www.mixamo.com/#/
  • Sprites by https://www.kenney.nl/assets
